apple.caption: 1 minute to Daikokucho Station, and Namba is an easy walk. Relaxed international community in a cozy lounge.
apple.name: Apple House
apple.summary: Well-appointed private rooms and a luxe lounge

lemon.caption: Lemon House is an 8-minute walk from Namba. Walk to nightlife spots without worrying about the last train.
lemon.name: Lemon House
lemon.summary: Share house 8 minutes from Namba Station

orange.caption: Prime access to retro Showachō. International crowd in our Japanese-style lounge.
orange.name: Orange House
